courseDetails.title: SMART Goals Parenting
courseDetails.shortDescription: 5 Skills to Parenting Healthier and Easier. Bye-Bye Power Struggles!
courseDetails.longDescription:
Many parents describe the desires for their children as "I want my kids to be happy" or "I want them to have a good life." But these goals are abstract and difficult to achieve once, let alone repeat.


SMART Goals Parenting breaks these (and other) abstract desires down into their basic foundational components that allow you and your child to achieve happiness, connection, trust and respect... repeatedly.


SMART Goals Parenting's objective is to provide you with the knowledge and tools to cultivate your desired relationship with your child while also preparing your child for being able to one day cultivate happiness and success for him/herself.

You will learn the two SMART goals, which will be your guiding lights are you traverse the terrain of parenthood.


As long as you maintain your focus on what you are ultimately trying to achieve you won't get lost in the minutia.

After learning the SMART goals you will learn how to identify and avoid the pitfalls of choosing fear over love and discarding self-care.


Engaging in these two behaviors will sabotage all of your work. It will be like pouring water into a bottle with no bottom. If you have ever felt unappreciated, unloved, disrespected or criticized for your parenting efforts then I am certain one or both of these barriers are at play.

The next few lessons will tackle guidance.


My goal is to get you to the point when guiding your child is a simple conversation in which both of you feel understood and respected. Until then, you may need these skills to help you navigate.


Choices, Consequences, Rewards and Reinforce (CCRR) are the four parts of seamless discipline.


Streamline how you discipline and remove all power struggles. Doing so will solidify you as your child's respected figure and someone s/he can look up to.


The last, but not least topics covered are the most used parts of communication - listening and speaking. You should listen to understand and speak to build trust.


Many Parents, Myself included have practiced these, eliminating Parenting Stress, following Structured Guidance, helping to Raise Healthy, Confident and Motivated Children.


I look forward to helping you do the same.


Best regards,

Helen V Hicks MA MBA LPC

Licensed Professional Counselor, Parenting Coach
targetAudiences: Parents or caregivers of children aged 1 to 17 years old

You won’t need to know how to code. You won’t need to spend money on complex software stacks. Everything you learn is plug-and-play and focused on real-world implementation.


White-Label Agency Training Included

One of the key reasons this course stands out from typical Udemy ORM courses is its deep dive into white-labeling and client reselling. You’ll learn how to:

No Fluff, Just Results

This course is designed for implementation, not information overload. Every lecture leads to action—whether it’s setting up automation, embedding reviews, or closing your next client.

Why This Course?

Unlike other courses, we won’t just talk about “reputation” in theory. You’ll get your hands dirty with tools that real businesses use—configured, customized, and launched the right way.

courseDetails.longDescription:
¿DESEAS CREAR UNA PÁGINA WEB Y GENERAR INGRESOS VENDIENDO TOURS Y PAQUETES TURÍSTICOS ?


WP Travel Engine es un plugin gratuito de WordPress que permite crear y gestionar paquetes de viajes. Está diseñado para agencias de viajes, operadores turísticos y otros negocios relacionados con el turismo.


WP Travel Engine permite:

  • Crear itinerarios ilimitados.

  • Añadir destinos y precios a los viajes.

  • Recibir pagos de los huéspedes.

  • Mejorar el posicionamiento en los motores de búsqueda.

  • Aumentar la tasa de conversión.

  • Crear sitios web optimizados para SEO.

  • Vender paquetes de viajes.

  • Aumentar las reservas, las consultas y el valor del pedido medio (AOV).


WP Travel Engine es compatible con el tema Travel Monster, que permite crear sitios web para agencias de viajes.

WP Travel Engine Pro es una versión con funciones avanzadas que permite ahorrar tiempo en la creación de sitios web para agencias de viajes.

Empezó en 2003 como un software para blogs, pero con el tiempo ha evolucionado como CMS completo con el que podemos hacer sitios web corporativos, tiendas online, sitios de membresía, intranets y mucho más.

¿DESEAS CREAR UNA PÁGINA WEB CON WORPDRESS Y CLOUDWAYS?


Una página web es una herramienta excelente para facilitar la comunicación y la interacción con los clientes. A través de un sitio web, los usuarios pueden acceder a información sobre productos y servicios, realizar consultas, solicitar presupuestos, dejar comentarios y mucho más.


Tener una presencia en internet es imprescindible para cualquier tipo de negocio. No importa cuál sea el tamaño de tu negocio o la industria en la que desempeñes tu actividad, la importancia de una página web es indudable, ya que actúa como el mejor escaparate digital, lo que permite que las empresas estén al alcance de cualquiera en todo momento. ¡No estar en línea equivale a perder oportunidades de negocio y visibilidad! En un mundo cada vez más digital, la sostenibilidad de las empresas depende de cómo se adapten estas a la transformación digital.


¿QUÉ ES CLOUDWAYS?


Cloudways es una plataforma de alojamiento en la nube que permite crear y administrar aplicaciones web. Ofrece servicios de computación en la nube para empresas.

Características:

  • Permite elegir entre varios proveedores de infraestructura en la nube.

  • Ofrece hosting gestionado de WordPress y WooCommerce.

  • Cuenta con un panel de control.

  • Ofrece soporte técnico 24/7.

  • Realiza copias de seguridad gestionadas.

  • Cuenta con seguridad gestionada.

  • Ofrece escalabilidad de rendimiento.

  • Cuenta con almacenamiento en caché avanzado.

  • Ofrece protección contra malware.


Beneficios:


  • Permite a los desarrolladores y negocios concentrarse en sus aplicaciones y sitios web.

  • Elimina la necesidad de conocimientos técnicos avanzados.

  • Permite implementar populares aplicaciones basadas en PHP en el alojamiento de infraestructura.

  • Ofrece una experiencia de hosting gestionado optimizada.

  • Permite migrar sitios web sin interrupciones ni complicaciones.


¿QUÉ ES WORDPRESS?


WordPress es un software gratuito o herramienta de gestión de contenidos, también llamado CMS (Content Management System), diseñada para crear y mantener fácilmente un Blog, un sitio Web o una Tienda Online.


WordPress es sin duda alguna, el mejor gestor de contenidos del mundo, y el más utilizado con diferencia, llegando actualmente a superar el 58% de cuota de mercado. Además es de código abierto y completamente gratuito.

This course is thoughtfully designed for beginners and those looking to advance their Python skills.

Python is incredibly powerful, yet surprisingly easy to learn, making it an ideal choice for beginners and professionals alike.

Hi, I'm Haris—a software developer with extensive experience—and I'll be your instructor for this exciting Python Crash Course. I've successfully taught many people how to code, and I'm excited to teach you too!

Before we dive in, I encourage you to follow me on my various channels. Your support will inspire me to create even more courses in the future, helping aspiring programmers like you reach their goals.

courseDetails.title: Building a Personal Brand on Linkedin & X (Twitter) w/ AI

They are the new search engines for professionals. Clients, recruiters, partners, and investors are all watching. The people who stand out are the ones who know how to build authority and stay visible. This course shows you how to turn your profile into a magnet for opportunities by combining personal branding with the power of AI.


Whether you want more clients for your business, better job opportunities, or simply to be seen as a trusted expert in your field, the steps are the same. You need a profile that makes people stop and pay attention, content that builds trust, and consistent engagement that puts you in front of the right audience every single day. Doing all of this manually is tough and takes hours. That is where AI makes the difference. Inside this course, you will learn how to use AI tools to comment, engage, and grow your presence on LinkedIn and X without burning out.


We will start by setting a clear goal. Do you want clients, career growth, or authority in your niche? From there, you will learn how to polish your LinkedIn and X profiles so they tell your story in a way that attracts the right people. You will see how to position yourself as a professional authority even if you are starting from zero. Then we go into the real growth engine: AI-powered engagement. You will discover how to automatically join conversations in your industry, personalize your tone, and leave comments that feel authentic. These small actions build visibility faster than trying to go viral with one post.


You will also learn how to find the right creators, hashtags, and keywords to engage with. Instead of shouting into the void, you will put yourself in front of audiences that already care about your topic. AI makes this process easier by handling the heavy lifting, so you can focus on relationships and strategy. Imagine your profile showing up daily in the feeds of potential clients, hiring managers, or collaborators. That is how authority compounds over time.


For business owners, this means more inbound leads. For freelancers, this means more projects and referrals. For career professionals, this means recruiters and managers reaching out to you instead of the other way around. The beauty of this system is that it does not depend on spending money on ads or trying to chase viral growth. It is steady, consistent, and designed for long-term success.


Along the way, you will also see bonus strategies for finding clients through direct methods like cold email, Google Maps, and search. These lessons give you an edge if you want to combine inbound authority with outbound prospecting. By the end of the course, you will have both a personal brand and a client acquisition system that works together.


This course is built for entrepreneurs, freelancers, consultants, coaches, agency owners, and career professionals who want to grow their presence online. You do not need to be a marketer or a content creator. All you need is a profile and the willingness to take simple actions consistently. The AI tools will help you scale those actions in a way that feels natural and personal.


Every lecture is practical and hands-on. You will see step-by-step demonstrations, learn how to set things up, and apply them to your own profile. You will walk away with a profile that builds trust, a content and engagement strategy that gets attention, and an AI assistant that works in the background while you focus on your career or business.


If you are tired of being invisible online or struggling to stand out, this course will give you the system you need. By the end, your LinkedIn and X profiles will not just be social accounts. They will be powerful assets that attract opportunities, build authority, and open doors in your business and career.

These functions will guide you in identifying privacy risks, establishing effective privacy governance, implementing practical controls, and communicating privacy practices to stakeholders.

By the end of this course, you will be able to create customized privacy policies, manage third-party risks with Data Processing Agreements, and respond to privacy breaches using clear incident response plans. You'll also learn how to assess your organization’s privacy maturity with implementation tiers and adjust the framework to align with your business goals.

Whether you are new to privacy management or looking to enhance your skills, this course offers practical examples and actionable insights that can be applied immediately in your organization. With a focus on real-world application, this course will empower you to protect personal information, reduce privacy risks, and build trust with your stakeholders.

courseDetails.title: Crea un MarketPlace Multi Vendedor con WordPress y Dokan
courseDetails.shortDescription: Genera ingresos creando tu propio Marketplace Multi Vendedor al estilo de Amazon o Mercado Libre.
courseDetails.longDescription:
¿DESEAS CREAR UN MARKETPLACE MULTIVENDEDOR CON WORPDRESS, WOOCOMMERCE Y DOKAN PARA GENERAR INGRESOS CON MÚLTIPLES TIENDAS DESDE UN MISMO LUGAR?

El Marketplace se refiere a un concepto más amplio de ventas online. En esta plataforma, diferentes tiendas pueden anunciar sus productos, ofreciéndole de esa forma, un abanico de opciones al cliente.

El concepto de Marketplace no es nuevo. En América Latina surgió en 2012 y, hoy en día, muchas grandes empresas digitales ya se han adherido. Algunos ejemplos de Marketplace son Amazon, Google Shopping y Mercado Libre.

Como ya dijimos existen varias diferencias entre un Marketplace y un E-Commerce.

En el caso de un E-Commerce, entras en el sitio web de una tienda X y eliges un producto que es vendido y enviado por la propia tienda.

En el caso de un Marketplace puedes entrar en el sitio web de la tienda X y elegir un producto que está siendo vendido y enviado por la tienda Y.


¿QUÉ ES WORDPRESS?

WordPress es un software gratuito o herramienta de gestión de contenidos, también llamado CMS (Content Management System), diseñada para crear y mantener fácilmente un Blog, un sitio Web o una Tienda Online.


WordPress es sin duda alguna, el mejor gestor de contenidos del mundo, y el más utilizado con diferencia, llegando actualmente a superar el 58% de cuota de mercado. Además es de código abierto y completamente gratuito.

Empezó en 2003 como un software para blogs, pero con el tiempo ha evolucionado como CMS completo con el que podemos hacer sitios web corporativos, tiendas online, sitios de membresía, intranets y mucho más.


¿QUÉ ES WOOCOMMERCE?

WooCommerce es un plugin (complemento) de WordPress que permite implementar una tienda online totalmente funcional en una web.

Este plugin incluye todo lo necesario para empezar a vender en línea:

Las páginas de tienda, carrito, mi cuenta y finalizar compra, los métodos de pago más utilizados en el mundo (transferencia bancaria, PayPal y Stripe), un sistema para configurar diferentes tipos de impuestos y gastos de envío por zonas, etc.

Por supuesto, también permite la subida de un número ilimitado de productos para su venta, pudiendo añadir su precio, descripciones (una corta y una larga), variaciones del mismo, etc.

En definitiva, WooCommerce es una de las mejores opciones que existen para crear una tienda online.


¿QUÉ ES DOKAN?

Dokan es un complemento de múltiples proveedores para WordPress diseñado para ayudar a los proveedores a personalizar las tiendas y administrar el inventario de productos desde una plataforma unificada.

Proporciona una solución completa multivendedor para crear un marketplace con WooCommerce. Su diseño e interfaz súper intuitivos hacen la configuración y gestión de la tienda multivendedor muy sencilla, incluso para principiantes. Su automatización es tan completa que prácticamente sólo tendrás que revisar los pedidos

En nuestro curso utilizaremos las últimas técnicas para crear y diseñar un Marketplace Multi Vendedor, utilizando la plataforma de WordPress y los plugins de WooCommerce y Dokan que nos brindará todas las funciones y opciones necesarias para crear y diseñar nuestro Marketplace Multi Vendedor, que llevarán su negocio a un siguiente nivel.

Nuestro curso es 100% práctico, lo guiaremos a través de diversos pasos y juntos crearemos su Marketplace Multi Vendedor con WordPress, WooCommerce y Dokan, de modo que al finalizar nuestro curso, tendrá su Marketplace Multi Vendedor diseñado con su personalización y a su gusto.

¿QUÉ APRENDERÁS EN NUESTRO CURSO?

  • Cómo crear un Marketplace Multi Vendedor con WordPress, WooCommerce y Dokan.

  • Cómo instalar una plantilla para tu Marketplace.

courseDetails.longDescription:
Becoming parents is a beautiful journey, but it can also challenge even the strongest relationships. In the midst of sleepless nights, diaper changes, and new responsibilities, many couples find themselves feeling disconnected, overwhelmed, or emotionally distant. "Love After Baby: Reconnecting as a Couple Post-Parenthood" is your essential guide to rediscovering intimacy, rebuilding emotional connection, and strengthening your romantic bond after having a baby.

This transformative course is designed for new parents, couples struggling after childbirth, and partners seeking to reignite the spark in their relationship. You'll learn proven relationship-building strategies, effective communication techniques, and emotional intimacy exercises tailored specifically for the postpartum phase.

Through expert insights, real-life examples, and practical tools, you and your partner will gain the skills needed to navigate parenting stress, set healthy boundaries, enhance intimacy after baby, and bring joy back into your relationship.

Whether you're in the early weeks of parenthood or months into the journey, this course will help you:

  • Reconnect emotionally and physically with your partner

  • Improve communication and reduce misunderstandings

  • Restore sexual intimacy after childbirth

  • Build mutual support and deepen trust

  • Create a healthy balance between parenting and partnership

By the end of this course, you’ll feel more united as a couple, more confident in your relationship, and more capable of building a loving, supportive environment for your growing family.
